effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. If the target has less than half its max HP remaining, this move has double power.
effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts regular damage. If the target has less than half its max HP remaining, this move has double power.

short_effect.black_white: Has double power against Pokémon that have less than half their max HP remaining.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Has double power against Pokémon that have less than half their max HP remaining.

flavor_text.black_white: If the target’s HP is down to about half, this attack will hit with double the power.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: If the target’s HP is down to about half, this attack will hit with double the power.
